name: Dread in Deep Voyage
description:
You are a Scuba Machinist, working for the largest Aquatic Theme Park in the world. It is your job to perform maintenance on a long abandoned attraction known as 'Deep Voyage'. Who knows what lurks down there...?

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

- Use mouse to look around

- LMB to interact

- WASD to move

- LShift to sprint

- 'F' to toggle the flashlight

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

This small horror, retro low-poly game is a submission to the HPS1 Summer of Shivers Game Jam.

It is based around the theme of *'Submechanophobia'.

*The fear of submerged man-made objects (eg. machines or shipwrecks).

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Warning; Potential Epilepsy Hazard

Note: The Mac and Linux versions are untested. Please inform me of any issues.

Feedback is always appreciated. I will be grateful for any reported issues!
